description: Practice Finnish yes/no questions (-ko) and question words!

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Sin√§ olet opiskelija.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb and move it first: Oletko sin√§ opiskelija?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'H√§n asuu Turussa.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb and move it first: Asuuko h√§n Turussa?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Te puhutte ranskaa.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb and move it first: Puhutteko te ranskaa?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Hans puhuu saksaa.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb and move it first: Puhuuko Hans saksaa?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Sin√§ olet suomalainen.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Oletko sin√§ suomalainen?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'H√§n on opettaja.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Onko h√§n opettaja?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Me asumme Helsingiss√§.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Asummeko me Helsingiss√§?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'He ovat v√§syneit√§.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Ovatko he v√§syneit√§?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Sin√§ sy√∂t leip√§√§.'
questions.explanation: Add -k√∂ to verb (front vowel): Sy√∂tk√∂ sin√§ leip√§√§?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Minulla on koira.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Onko minulla koira?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Sin√§ juot kahvia.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Juotko sin√§ kahvia?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'T√§m√§ on hyv√§ kirja.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Onko t√§m√§ hyv√§ kirja?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'H√§n opiskelee suomea.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Opiskeleeko h√§n suomea?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'Te tulette huomenna.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Tuletteko te huomenna?

questions.question: Make a yes/no question: 'H√§nell√§ on siniset silm√§t.'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb: Onko h√§nell√§ siniset silm√§t?

questions.question: Translate: 'What is your name?' (use mik√§)
questions.explanation: Mik√§ is used with olla verb: Mik√§ sinun nimi on?

questions.question: Translate: 'What do you eat?' (use mit√§)
questions.explanation: Mit√§ (partitive) is used with other verbs: Mit√§ sin√§ sy√∂t?

questions.question: Which question word: 'What is this?' - ___ t√§m√§ on?
questions.explanation: Mik√§ is used with olla verb: Mik√§ t√§m√§ on?

questions.question: Which question word: 'What are you drinking?' - ___ sin√§ juot?
questions.explanation: Mit√§ (partitive) with other verbs: Mit√§ sin√§ juot?

questions.question: Choose: '___ sinun puhelinnumero on?'
questions.explanation: Mik√§ is used with olla: Mik√§ sinun puhelinnumero on?

questions.question: Choose: '___ sin√§ luet?' (What are you reading?)
questions.explanation: Mit√§ with other verbs: Mit√§ sin√§ luet?

questions.question: Choose: '___ tuo mies on?' (Who is that man?)
questions.explanation: Kuka means 'who': Kuka tuo mies on?

questions.question: Choose: '___ kello on?' (What time is it?)
questions.explanation: Exception: Mit√§ kello on? is a fixed expression

questions.question: Choose: '___ sin√§ odotat?' (Who do you wait for?)
questions.explanation: Ket√§ is partitive of kuka (used with verbs): Ket√§ sin√§ odotat?

questions.question: Translate: 'Where do you live?'
questions.explanation: Miss√§ = where (in/at): Miss√§ sin√§ asut?

questions.question: Translate: 'Where are you from?'
questions.explanation: Mist√§ = where from: Mist√§ sin√§ olet kotoisin?

questions.question: Translate: 'Where are you going?'
questions.explanation: Mihin = where to: Mihin sin√§ menet? (also: Minne)

questions.question: Translate: 'When is Christmas?'
questions.explanation: Milloin = when: Milloin joulu on?

questions.question: Translate: 'Why are you wearing a coat?'
questions.explanation: Miksi = why: Miksi sinulla on takki p√§√§ll√§?

questions.question: Translate: 'How many days are in a week?'
questions.explanation: Montako = how many: Montako p√§iv√§√§ on viikossa?

questions.question: Translate: 'How much time do you have?'
questions.explanation: Paljonko = how much: Paljonko aikaa sinulla on?

questions.question: Translate: 'What is (s)he like?'
questions.explanation: Millainen = what kind of: Millainen h√§n on?

questions.question: Translate: 'Whose home country is Brazil?'
questions.explanation: Kenen = whose: Kenen kotimaa on Brasilia?

questions.question: Choose: '___ sin√§ asut?' (Where do you live?)
questions.explanation: Miss√§ = where (location): Miss√§ sin√§ asut?

questions.question: Choose: '___ sin√§ tulet?' (Where do you come from?)
questions.explanation: Mist√§ = where from: Mist√§ sin√§ tulet?

questions.question: Choose: '___ sin√§ menet?' (Where are you going?)
questions.explanation: Mihin = where to: Mihin sin√§ menet?

questions.question: Choose: '___ se maksaa?' (How much does it cost?)
questions.explanation: Paljonko = how much: Paljonko se maksaa?

questions.question: Choose: '___ lapsia sinulla on?' (How many children do you have?)
questions.explanation: Montako = how many: Montako lapsia sinulla on?

questions.question: Choose: '___ n√§hd√§√§n taas?' (When will we see again?)
questions.explanation: Milloin = when: Milloin n√§hd√§√§n taas?

questions.question: Choose: '___ t√§√§ll√§ on kylm√§?' (Why is it cold here?)
questions.explanation: Miksi = why: Miksi t√§√§ll√§ on kylm√§?

questions.question: Choose: '___ t√§m√§ elokuva kest√§√§?' (How long will this movie last?)
questions.explanation: Kuinka kauan = how long: Kuinka kauan t√§m√§ elokuva kest√§√§?

questions.question: Translate: 'Where are you from?' (using mink√§maalainen)
questions.explanation: Mink√§maalainen = what nationality: Mink√§maalainen sin√§ olet?

questions.question: Translate: 'How old are you?'
questions.explanation: Mink√§ik√§inen = how old: Mink√§ik√§inen sin√§ olet?

questions.question: Translate: 'What does she look like?'
questions.explanation: Mink√§n√§k√∂inen = what does (s)he look like: Mink√§n√§k√∂inen h√§n on?

questions.question: Translate: 'How tall are you?'
questions.explanation: Mink√§pituinen = how tall/long: Mink√§pituinen sin√§ olet?

questions.question: Translate: 'What size is the pizza?'
questions.explanation: Mink√§kokoinen = what size: Mink√§kokoinen pizza on?

questions.question: Translate: 'What colour is a carrot?'
questions.explanation: Mink√§v√§rinen = what colour: Mink√§v√§rinen porkkana on?

questions.question: The pattern mink√§ + quality + inen asks about ___
options: a specific quality (age, size, color, etc.)
questions.correct: a specific quality (age, size, color, etc.)
questions.explanation: Mink√§ + inen pattern asks about specific qualities!

questions.question: Match: maa (country) ‚Üí mink√§___?
questions.explanation: maa ‚Üí mink√§maalainen (what nationality)

questions.question: Match: ik√§ (age) ‚Üí mink√§___?
questions.explanation: ik√§ ‚Üí mink√§ik√§inen (how old)

questions.question: Match: v√§ri (colour) ‚Üí mink√§___?
questions.explanation: v√§ri ‚Üí mink√§v√§rinen (what colour)

questions.question: Match: koko (size) ‚Üí mink√§___?
questions.explanation: koko ‚Üí mink√§kokoinen (what size)

questions.question: Match: pituus (length/height) ‚Üí mink√§___?
questions.explanation: pituus ‚Üí mink√§pituinen (how tall/long)

questions.question: Match: ulkon√§k√∂ (appearance) ‚Üí mink√§___?
questions.explanation: ulkon√§k√∂ ‚Üí mink√§n√§k√∂inen (what does look like)

questions.question: What's the difference: 'Mik√§' vs 'Mit√§'?
options: Mik√§ with olla, Mit√§ with other verbs
Mik√§ for people, Mit√§ for things
Mit√§ with olla, Mik√§ with other verbs
questions.correct: Mik√§ with olla, Mit√§ with other verbs
questions.explanation: Mik√§ is used with olla verb, Mit√§ (partitive) with other verbs!

questions.question: What's the difference: 'Kuka' vs 'Ket√§'?
options: Kuka with olla, Ket√§ with other verbs
Kuka for women, Ket√§ for men
Ket√§ with olla, Kuka with other verbs
questions.correct: Kuka with olla, Ket√§ with other verbs
questions.explanation: Kuka with olla verb, Ket√§ (partitive) with other verbs!

questions.question: What's the difference: 'Miss√§' vs 'Mist√§' vs 'Mihin'?
options: Miss√§ = where at, Mist√§ = where from, Mihin = where to
Miss√§ = when, Mist√§ = why, Mihin = how
questions.correct: Miss√§ = where at, Mist√§ = where from, Mihin = where to
questions.explanation: Location trio: Miss√§ (at), Mist√§ (from), Mihin (to)

questions.question: How to form -ko questions in Finnish?
options: Add -ko to verb and move verb first
questions.correct: Add -ko to verb and move verb first
questions.explanation: Word order: SVO ‚Üí VSO, add -ko to verb

questions.question: Translate: 'Do you speak Finnish?'
questions.explanation: Add -ko to verb first: Puhutko sin√§ suomea?

questions.question: Translate: 'Are you tired?'
questions.explanation: Oletko sin√§ v√§synyt?

questions.question: Translate: 'Is she a student?'
questions.explanation: Onko h√§n opiskelija?

questions.question: Translate: 'Do they live in Finland?'
questions.explanation: Asuvatko he Suomessa?

questions.question: Translate: 'What is your job?'
questions.explanation: Mik√§ with olla: Mik√§ sinun ammatti on?

questions.question: Translate: 'What are you studying?'
questions.explanation: Mit√§ with other verbs: Mit√§ sin√§ opiskelet?

questions.question: Translate: 'Who is your teacher?'
questions.explanation: Kuka with olla: Kuka on sinun opettaja?

questions.question: Translate: 'When do you wake up?'
questions.explanation: Milloin = when: Milloin sin√§ her√§√§t?

questions.question: Translate: 'Where do you work?'
questions.explanation: Miss√§ = where (at): Miss√§ sin√§ ty√∂skentelet?

questions.question: Translate: 'Why are you late?'
questions.explanation: Miksi = why: Miksi sin√§ olet my√∂h√§ss√§?

questions.question: Translate: 'How do you say that in Finnish?'
questions.explanation: Miten = how: Miten sen sanoo suomeksi?

questions.question: Translate: 'What kind of food do you like?'
questions.explanation: Millainen = what kind of: Millaista ruokaa sin√§ pid√§t?

questions.question: Answer with correct form: 'Mink√§maalainen sin√§ olet?' - I am Finnish
questions.explanation: Nationality adjective: Min√§ olen suomalainen.

questions.question: Answer with correct form: 'Mink√§ik√§inen sin√§ olet?' - I am 25
questions.explanation: All answers are acceptable: 25, 25 vuotta, 25-vuotias

questions.question: Answer: 'Mink√§n√§k√∂inen h√§n on?' - He is tall and thin
questions.explanation: Nominative adjectives: H√§n on pitk√§ ja hoikka.

questions.question: Answer: 'Mink√§v√§rinen auto on?' - It is red
questions.explanation: Nominative: Se on punainen.

questions.question: Make a -ko question: 'H√§nell√§ on kaksi lasta.'
questions.explanation: Onko h√§nell√§ kaksi lasta?

questions.question: Make a -ko question: 'Sin√§ pid√§t kahvista.'
questions.explanation: Pid√§tk√∂ sin√§ kahvista?

questions.question: Make a -ko question: 'T√§m√§ on hyv√§ ravintola.'
questions.explanation: Onko t√§m√§ hyv√§ ravintola?

questions.question: Choose correct question word: '___ Lauri Markkanen?' (Who is Lauri Markkanen?)
questions.explanation: Kuka with olla for asking about identity

questions.question: Answer to '-ko question' with yes: 'Oletko sin√§ opiskelija?'
questions.explanation: All ways are correct to answer yes!

questions.question: Answer to '-ko question' with no: 'Puhutko sin√§ ranskaa?'
questions.explanation: All ways are correct to answer no!
